Package com.xith3d.sound

Interface Summary
SoundBuffer A sound buffer is a piece of memory which stores the PCM format of the sound to be played.
SoundDataContainer A sound data container is what acts as a generator for the actual sound data which will be played.
SoundDriver Implementations of a sound driver must implement this interface.
SoundSource A sound source represents a single source of sound to be played.
 

Class Summary
BufferFormat  
BufferState A Buffer encapsulates state related to storing sample data.
SoundAtom A sound atom is request to make a change to the sound system during a frame rendering.
SoundState  
 

Exception Summary
SoundException Insert package comments here
